posts.name: Murilo Miranda Santos
posts.cooked: Good morning! My FRC team is having problems programming an elevator for the season. Sometimes it loses its orientation, for example: we predefined a position for each reef height level, when we press a button for L for example, it goes normally, but after a while of training, when we press the same button for L3 it goes up more than it should, it thinks that 0 (position that picks up the coral) is halfway up the elevator and so on. Does anyone know what this could be?

Hello! You can only correct the speed and power of the elevator, but you should be careful because you cannot increase it too much so as not to leave room for error. The gyroscope also plays a very important role in the elevator, if possible, invert it. I hope I helped.

posts.name: Chris Gerth
posts.cooked:
Using a tool like glass or advantageScope , plot the values of some variables from your code.

Critically, I’d want to know the value of some variables which tell where you are commanding your elevator to be at, and where your elevator is measured to be at over time.

link_counts.title: Introduction to Glass — FIRST Robotics Competition documentation

posts.name: Murilo Miranda Santos
posts.cooked: i’m using a setpoint values and a through bore encoder for know the position values

posts.name: John Slagel
posts.cooked: @Paulo4568 Did you mean to say “gyroscope” or did you mean “encoder”? Thanks!!

posts.name: Joe Ross
posts.cooked:
It’s good that you’re using an encoder. But do you know if the encoder is providing the correct position data when this bug occurs? Do you know if the setpoint you intend to set is being set? These are the types of problems that could cause the behavior you’re seeing.

Use the scientific method. Come up with a hypothesis on what could cause the behavior you see, and then measure data to either prove the hypothesis right or tell you to find a new hypothesis.

posts.name: seg9585
posts.cooked: Is it possible your chain/belt is skipping?  If you are using a motor-embedded encoder and have no reset such as a limit switch or “truth” encoder somewhere, this can happen

posts.name: Murilo Miranda Santos
posts.cooked: eu estou usando corrente e um through bore encodeer em seu modo relativo, além de usar fins de cursos para limitar o elevador
